participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Enthusiastic and creative, with a love for classic cars and country music.
participant_1.background: i have two dogs. i like to work on vintage cars. my favorite music is country. i own two vintage mustangs.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Friendly and active, enjoys outdoor activities and values family.
participant_2.background: i enjoy long walks with my dog. i'm married to a doctor. i am a professional tennis player. my family is continuously growing. i live in a three storey house.
